description: Custom Robo is an action RPG where you become a Commander, taking control of your custom robo to dominate the holoseum!

V0.1.0.description:
## Custom Robo - Initial Alpha Release

Welcome to the genesis of the Custom Robo AP World! Here you'll find the AP World as well as a few libraries needed for the Dolphin interactions.

Please check out the setup within docs (https://github.com/Metaruler/ArchipelagoCR/blob/main/worlds/custom_robo/docs/setup_en.md)

I've also included a test YAML, but you can generate your own using standard Archipelago Template generation

KNOWN ISSUES (future fixes):

There's currently a bug if you receive multiple Rahu Evolution items in one network receive step, it will only give the highest tier part from that group and not the ones below (beating the game will still release the check from usage of that skipped item)

There is no indicator in-game when you send or receive an item, only on the AP Client.
V0.1.0.title: Custom Robo AP V0.1

V0.1.1.description:
Logic and bugfixes! The Custom Robo build now does the following:

- Rahu Evolution now gives parts properly even when receiving multiple at once
- Fixed the rules for each Part Use location to require obtaining the related Part before it can be checked (should fix Universal Tracker display)
- Setup document has been updated with details on workaround when no ISO path is queried for
V0.1.1.title: Custom Robo AP V0.1.1

V0.1.2r2.description:
A couple new things for this version:

- Added archipelago.json to adhere to future Archipelago core standards
- Added regions and organization on the AP World side to improve item placement logic (no more early game items in Chapter 13...)

Known Issues:
- Still working on that bug that won't prompt for the ROM path, still likely requires manual entry in host.yaml
V0.1.2r2.title: Custom Robo AP V0.1.2

V0.2.description:
Version 0.2 is here! This one comes with fixing a few long-time issues:

- Patcher should now properly query for your ISO path if not found in the host.yaml, should fix the need to enter it manually from here on!
- Fixed a bug where Standard Leg still showed unused when it hadn't yet been obtained
- Fixed a bug where Grand Cross Bomb immediately triggered its usage check upon obtaining the part

Look forward to the next exciting chapter!
V0.2.title: Custom Robo AP V0.2

V0.3.description:
Mostly under-the-hood things for this update, comes with the following:

- Playthrough should now calculate properly due to tweaking Victory logic
- Changed patching logic to deconflict with other worlds that use the same method of seed verification. Shouldn't conflict with other Gamecube worlds saves anymore!
V0.3.title: Custom Robo AP V0.3
